title: The Second Choice
description: Pavithra was married to Anand, who was her collegemate. Her happy life ends abruptly with her husband's demise, and she returns to her father's home with her 3-year-old daughter. After a year, her father persuades her for a second marriage with Venu, who was also somewhat in the same position. Initially, she was not yet ready for a second marriage, later agrees to her father's request. Both Pavithra and Venu wanted each other's company for the sake of their two daughters. Will the couple find love in each other, and will Pavithra have a happy and secured life as her father had expected?
author: Lakshmi Menon
